name: amegmen
description: AMegMen (Accessible MegaMenu) is an Keyboard accessible, jQuery-free and Framework-free MegaMenu plugin which is fully responsive, and supports multiple levels.

scripts.compile:sass: node-sass --source-map true src/sass-theme-1/ -o native/styles/theme-1 && node-sass --source-map true src/sass-theme-2/ -o native/styles/theme-2
scripts.tscompile:esnext: tsc --target ESNEXT --module ESNEXT --outDir ./dist/scripts --declaration true --declarationMap true --sourceMap true
scripts.compile:ts: npm run tscompile:es3 && npm run tscompile:esnext
scripts.uglify:css: uglifycss native/styles/theme-1/amegmen.css --output native/styles/theme-1/amegmen.min.css && uglifycss native/styles/theme-2/amegmen.css --output native/styles/theme-2/amegmen.min.css
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:sass
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dev && npm run uglify:js && npm run uglify:css && npm run compile:sitesass
scripts.compile:sitesass: node-sass --source-map false src/sass-site/ -o native/styles/site && uglifycss native/styles/site/index.css --output native/styles/site/index.min.css

author: https://github.com/adityakahb
